alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Franklin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:18PM CDT until August 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Franklin County in north central Iowa... Southwestern Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 917 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meservey, or 15 miles southeast of Garner, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Hampton, Latimer, Coulter, Meservey, Alexander, Bradford, Chapin, Hampton Municipal Airport, and Beeds Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 167 and 178. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
